name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Beijing. A man posted a video saying that last year he was detained by local police in Belarus for $40,000, and the other party has not returned it yet. The local police also cursed at him, "Fuck, give me the dollars." Afterwards, he called the Chinese Embassy countless times and sent more than a dozen emails. The embassy replied: wait patiently, but there has been no progress so far. Netizens: Take out your passport, just make them tremble.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 15, Beijing. A lawyer posted a video saying that his colleagues are really outspoken, but now he dares not say many things because he will be complained if he does, and the Bar Association keeps calling him.
In order to ensure that his lawyer's license will not be revoked, he has become very timid now. He can only talk about many things in person and dares not say anything online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Weibo topic #Wuxi knife attack resulted in 8 deaths and 17 injuries# has been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, the Party Committee of the Ministry of Public Security held a meeting: Strengthen risk source prevention and control, crack down on prominent crimes in accordance with the law, and make every effort to protect the safety of people's lives and social stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xY12RbOXp9

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on November 15, Taiwan President Lai Ching-te will reportedly transit through Hawaii and Guam in the United States when he visits friendly countries in the South Pacific in a few weeks. 
Hawaii and Guam are both home to major US military bases.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of the 16th, students from Wuxi Institute of Technology blocked the dormitory doors with cabinets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/KXq3CDIEh3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen added
The report card of Xu Jiajin, the murderer of the Wuxi Technology indiscriminate murder case, only showed him as unqualified due to low internship score.
Vocational and technical schools in China will sign contracts with factories to send graduates to so-called "internships" and collect kickbacks from them. In addition, internships are linked to graduation. If you do not intern or resist internships, you will not be given a diploma.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A student cried and shouted "Call my mom"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, a student from Hengyang University of South China jumped off a building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, at the Zhuhai Sports Center, people still came to lay flowers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, a stabbing incident occurred at the University Town Campus of Guangzhou University of Technology. Afterwards, the murderer locked himself in the dormitory, while the security guards and police kicked the door from outside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/kdCmSoCB4o

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 17 (Released) It was reported online that a student with a baseball bat and another student with a knife fought each other at Guangdong University of Technology.
The video showed that there was blood all over the place. A student fell to the ground covered in blood, and another student locked himself in the dormitory. The security guards and police were outside trying to break the door.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, a Chinese student said that someone "stolen his power bank and data cable" in the UK, so he bought them for free in revenge and posted his "trophies". Not only that, there were also students sharing their experience of stealing in the comment section, "What is stealing? That's the 10 billion yuan subsidy left by Karl Lagerfeld."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, film and television hurricane "Tim" and his crew were filming in London, England, when they found a bicycle stolen on the roadside. Tim said, "They only stole but didn't rob in Italy, and ran away to France after picking it up. They stole and robbed in England, and bang bang, they shot the Americans."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 16, Zhuhai Sports Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Due to the recent incidents of car crashes across the country, some citizens called the mayor's hotline and suggested that in addition to banning motorcycles, four-wheeled cars should also be banned from the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 16, Suzhou, Jiangsu. A netizen posted that he and his partner occasionally use FaceTime to talk, but today he suddenly received a call from the police, who said that the calling software has been listed as a fraud software by the country and asked him to turn it off. "(The police) also said that today is a warning, and if I use it again, I will be investigated."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 14, Henan. A college student reported in his real name that the school dormitory violated the Geneva Convention: Our school crammed 5 beds in a room of less than 8 square meters, and the upper and lower bunks squeezed 10 people together. "There is no place to walk in the dormitory"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 14, Xichang, Sichuan. The former deputy team leader of the local sanitation department embezzled 3.04 million yuan, forged vouchers and borrowed 12 relatives' ID cards to claim wages, and was sentenced to ten years in prison, sparking heated discussions.
Netizens responded, "Sanitation workers are still owed 2,000 yuan a month"
"My parents are both sanitation workers, and their monthly salary is only more than 1,000 yuan"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, after a car hit a person in Zhuhai, Guangdong, official media from all over the country released videos to teach people how to save themselves when encountering such situations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One netizen said, "Do we need to learn this now?"
Another netizen replied, "This society is becoming more and more violent."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, after an indiscriminate knife-wounding incident occurred at Wuxi Institute of Technology, a blogger said that after reading the suicide note left by the murderer, he believed that the murderer was greatly influenced by the "positive energy big V" and suggested checking who he followed on his social media accounts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, a big V expressed his opinion on a knife attack at a university in Wuxi: (The murderer) Why didn't he go to a Japanese school? He suggested that people with suicidal or revengeful tendencies in the country go to Japanese schools to vent.
And there are many well-known "positive energy big Vs" in his follow list

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, the well-known "positive energy" blogger "孤雁暮蝉" wrote an article saying: The article written by the murderer of Wuxi University is very suspicious, and it contains a line from the movie "A Better Tomorrow".
And the post-00s kids don't know this movie at all, so it is very likely that it was written by someone born in the 1960s or 1970s.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Iran's Islamic regime will open psychiatric hospitals to "treat" women who refuse to cover their hair with veils in public. 
Mehri Darestani, head of women and family at Tehran's Morality Police, said science and psychological treatment will teach women to wear veils.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, Shanghai Changning Court published an article: Let the voices at the doorstep be heard.
But the comments section was closed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, Guangzhou Zhixin Middle School issued a notice that it had received a request from higher authorities to start investigating people over 56 years old who have no children, no marriage, and no parents. They wanted to "help them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 16 (Release) Huangshi Port, Huangshi City, Hubei Province. A woman's electric bicycle was confiscated by the traffic police, and she knelt down helplessly to beg for mercy, "Master, I beg you, I still have to pick up my children, I have no choice." November 14, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province. Law enforcement officers confiscated the tricycle of a street vendor, and the woman held on to the tricycle and refused to let go, wailing, "So many vehicles are not taken, but mine is taken." Passersby saw this and pleaded for the woman.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, a university in Shandong issued a notice requiring every student to add the local police’s WeChat account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 15, a netizen shared the recent breathtaking news: TSMC was reported to have "cut off" supply to China; the UK ordered Chinese capital to sell its 80% stake in FTDI chips; Samsung was also reported to have stopped supplying chips, etc. 
At present, this "breathtaking news" has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden met on Saturday during the annual Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit.
"We don't always agree, but our conversations are always candid and frank," said U.S. President Joe Biden.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, a Zhihu post titled "Why do some people feel resentment and take revenge on society" circulated on the Internet. One answerer used the experience of a student from Southern University of Science and Technology of Shenzhen who committed suicide as an example to describe the current dilemma that is prevalent in China, where stability is maintained blindly and ordinary people cannot solve problems through reasonable, legal and normal means.
Lamenting "Don't advise others to be kind without experiencing their pain. If you experience my pain, you may not be as kind as I am."
At the same time, according to people on campus, there have been many student suicides at Southern University of Science and Technology of Shenzhen since 2019, and at least six cases are currently known:
May 1, 2019: A graduate student who was about to graduate and had found a job jumped off a building on campus. The incident was exposed on Zhihu, but it has been harmonized by the school and can be searched on Baidu.
Around 2021: A doctor committed suicide because of delayed graduation.
In 2022, a postdoctoral fellow drowned in the school swimming pool
In the summer of 2022, to a certain student of the New Academy...
fullContent:
11月17日，一则“为什么有人心生怨恨，报复社会”的知乎帖子在互联网上流传。一位答主以深圳南方科技大学一名学生自杀的前后遭遇为例，讲述了当前国内普遍存在的，一味维稳，普通人无法通过合理合法正常途径解决问题的困境。
感叹“未经他人痛，莫劝他人善，你若经我痛，未必有我善。”
同时，据校内人士透露，深圳南方科技大学自2019年以来多起学生自杀，目前所知的至少六起：
2019年5月1日： 一位即将毕业已经找好工作的研究生在校内跳楼。该事件知乎有曝光过，但是已经被校方和谐，可以通过百度搜索到。
2021年左右：某位博士因为延毕自S。
2022年， 某位博士后在校内游泳池内溺亡
2022年暑假，致新书院某位深圳籍本科生在宿舍内自缢身亡，事发当时父亲开车在校门口等着接他，但是再也没有等来。
2024年4月，树仁书院某位贵州籍本科生在宿舍睡觉再也没有醒来，校方说他有哮喘史。
2024年暑假，树仁书院某位深圳籍本科生在宿舍内自缢身亡， 校方和警方未经家长现场确认就擅自处理孩子遗体，单方面判定孩子未自杀，没有留下遗书。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 16 (Released) A Russian soldier confidently said "I'm going to kill a bunch of Ukrainians" when he set out. He was captured that night and knelt on the ground and said "Putin is a bastard, glory to Ukraine"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: APEC summit leaders took a group photo. Xi Jinping arrived at the venue early and stood in the center. He had a private chat with leaders of various countries before taking the group photo. Biden arrived late at the last minute and stood on the side.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 15, Changsha, Hunan. Fifteen sanitation workers in Qiancheng Jiayuan Community were owed three months' wages, and a kind-hearted woman uploaded the matter to the Internet. "The old man no longer has money to eat."
 As a result, on the evening of the 15th, a stranger wandered outside the woman’s house and took a photo of the house number.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 17, a blogger posted: Why don't they hurt their enemies, but instead hurt innocent people?
If you don't understand the story behind the murderer, or even refuse to understand it, it will only lead to more tragedies
When a person is desperate, he is a freak in the world, and the hawking in the street market will overload his senses and collapse. And the gathering of people in the city provides them with convenience
In rural areas, there are people who have committed injustices and debts, so it is easy to find the other party

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 16, at the MixC Mall in Jining, a girl in white stood next to the escalator on the fourth floor, with her back half sitting on the handrail. At this time, someone happened to go down, and the girl was taken down by the escalator and fell from the fourth floor to her death. During this period, there was a glass plate behind her but it did not block her.
It is reported that the mall in question had just opened for only half a month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 16, Beijing. A senior teacher at Chaoyang Middle School published an article criticizing the American system: The American political system is too arbitrary, the president has too much power, and can even recruit relatives and friends to form a government at will. Many ministerial positions are held by people without experience. Civil servants must have grassroots experience. 
Netizens responded "Use pyramid power thinking to understand the capitalist state system"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"No malicious memories"
A blogger summarized three vicious injury incidents that occurred within 20 days: "Beijing Haidian knife-wounding incident", "Zhuhai Sports Center car-ramming incident", and "Wuxi Technology Vocational College knife-wounding incident".
The post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 16, at the Guangdong Zhuhai Air Show, garbage was scattered around the Y-20 aircraft, which is known as the "national heavy weapon", and there were trash cans just a few steps away.
Photographer: In recent years, "our national strength has been continuously developing, but where is the quality of our people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 16 (Released) Chinese student Wu Xiaolei was given a reduced sentence for intimidating pro-democracy activists and returned to China. However, some people called him a "real man" and a "hero"
